response.overview: "The Best of Ransom features this very popular model's video work for Bryan Ockert's ChaosMen from the past several years. You'll get to watch him evolve from a skinny twink who was only willing to do oral into a beefy dude getting off to both fucking and getting fucked. Ransom finally lets go and goes for full-on raw bareback action. The Best of Ransom shows him going from novice to pro over the course of eight scorching scenes."
response.title: The Best of Ransom
